name: Proton Mail Bridge
description: Proton Mail Bridge runs a local IMAP/SMTP service that lets traditional mail clients access a Proton mailbox. This LXC runs Bridge headless and forwards IMAP/SMTP to the LAN using systemd socket activation (systemd-socket-proxyd).

notes.text: After install, run protonmailbridge-init inside the container to create a pass keychain and log in via the Bridge CLI.
Use protonmailbridge-configure to temporarily stop the service and enter the Bridge CLI without running a second instance.
